name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
message: Welcome to the Department of Computer Science & Engineering. We are committed to excellence in education, research, and innovation. Our department strives to produce competent engineers who can contribute to society and industry.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
message: The ECE department is at the forefront of technological advancement. We focus on providing hands-on experience and industry-relevant skills to our students.

name: Dr. Amandeep Singh
message: Mechanical Engineering is the backbone of industry. Our department prepares students to tackle real-world engineering challenges with innovative solutions.

name: Dr. Gurpreet Kaur
message: Civil Engineering plays a crucial role in nation building. We train our students to design sustainable infrastructure for tomorrow.

name: Dr. Harpreet Singh
message: The Electrical Engineering department focuses on power generation, transmission, and renewable energy technologies to build a sustainable future.

name: Dr. Neha Gupta
message: Information Technology is transforming every aspect of modern life. Our department equips students with cutting-edge skills in software and IT systems.

name: Dr. Sukhwinder Kaur
message: Applied Sciences form the foundation of engineering education. We provide strong fundamental knowledge in science and mathematics.

name: Dr. Vikram Mehta
message: MBA program at SBSSU prepares future leaders and managers with strong business acumen and ethical values.
